name: Vikont
tagline: Helping you move to the cloud!
description:
We are authorized Google Apps for Business re-seller and certified sales and deployment specialist. We helped many Canadian businesses transition to Google Apps for Business since 2009. We know what you are dealing with on daily basis. Our starting point in 2000 was the traditional legacy system, but our future is the cloud.
Our services span from assessment of your needs and your current communication, office productivity and collaboration solution to the deployment of Google Apps. Our mandate is to ensure your business reaps all the benefits Google Apps has to offer, including maximizing productivity, security and flexibility and minimizing cost. You may need us to just migrate to Google Apps or you may need us to Manage the Change, provide Support and Training and ensure full Integration. Either way, we are here to help!
We also build and service e-commerce sites since 2000. Our first clients are still with us. Our mandate is to make or re-build sites to ensure successful on line business and to maximize your revenue potential. We do not just build award winning sites. We make sure your on line store works! Our motto is to not build and leave, but to build and grow.
